text: The Hôtel de Boadès is a listed hôtel particulier in Aix-en-Provence. ==Location== It is located at 8, place Jeanne d'Arc in the center of Aix-en- Provence.French Ministry of Culture ==History== In 1935, Blanche d’Estienne de Saint Jean, an heiress to the Château du Grand-Saint-Jean, donated it the city of Aix-en-Provence and asked them to donate the proceeds to the Academy of Aix-en-Provence. It is now home to city administration offices.Aix-en-Provence Tourism: CPA - Communauté du Pays d'Aix ==Heritage significance== It has been listed as a historical building since 1947. ==References== Category:Hôtels particuliers in Aix-en-Provence Category:Monuments historiques of Aix-en- Provence
title: Hôtel de Boadès
